meanings.definition: People who experience or endure something.
meanings.sent1: The brave undergoers faced the challenge head-on.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provides support for all undergoers of medical procedures.
meanings.sent3: The group of undergoers shared stories of their adventures.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the hero symbolized the undergoers of change.
meanings.sent5: The teacher praised the undergoers for their hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: Those who are subjected to a process or treatment.
meanings.sent1: The undergoers of the experiment followed all instructions carefully.
meanings.sent2: The company ensures the safety of all undergoers during the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent3: The undergoers of the spa treatment felt rejuvenated and relaxed.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush strokes represented the undergoers of transformation.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a special meal for the undergoers of the cooking class.
